welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Bertem, Belgium! This charming city is known for its picturesque scenery, historical landmarks, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bertem has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with unlimited usage for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport is responsible for handling all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building of Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal building used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
